title: Aside dumb balance, this is why nobody wants to play this game anymore.
body:
Haven't played for couple days, hmm maybe I should play few games today.
https://imgur.com/QcADdmT
https://imgur.com/CiBKUyK

First game jungler feeds, and bot lane feeds massively. Second game bot lane feeds and doesn't want to play anymore.
Because your matchmaking is fucking garbage. You can't provide a balanced game. Like why would I continue playing ? To hope matchmaking will give me somewhat decent teammates 2 hours later ? Yeah, no.

replies.body: Most of my frustrations with the game lately have stemmed from the same thing. The balance of champs/items/runes seems to become obsolete when you are handed a hard-loss via matchmaking.

Although i agree with your argument for the most part.


Using Flex rank as an example isn't the best way to go, considering people take aram more serious than flex.
